channel.title: Draconic Visage- Attaching - HELP PLEASE!
channel.description:
Alright, I am down to these last 2 things. I need help, I have never done something like this. :P
Ok.
1. How would I make it so if you use a Draconic Visage (ID 15187), and a anti-dragon shield(ID 1540), it turns into a Dragon-Fire Shield(ID 15185), ONLY IF YOU HAVE 90 SMITHING! If you do it right, it will give you 100K smithing xp.
2. If you weren't 90 smithing, how would I make it not let you make the shield and send the message " You need 90 smithing to attach the visage." "Sell the visage or raise your smithing at ::skills!"
I need to know what and where the code goes and what it is. Thanks!
All-Star Source

item.title: Draconic Visage- Attaching - HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

Let me whip up the visage on d fire sheild for you, idk how to make it 90 smithing but i can try give me a sec[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 03:54:36 pm[/size][hr] if(itemUsed == 15187 && useWith == 1540) {
deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
addItem(15185, 1);
sendMessage(“You create an Antifire Sheild!”);
}

Read full topic

Alright, I am down to these last 2 things. I need help, I have never done something like this.
